alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mainland Monroe, northern Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 310 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Miccosukee Resort, or 17 miles northwest of Kendall, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fortymile Bend, Dade-Collier Training Airport, Shark Valley Obs Tower, Miccosukee Resort, Tamiami and Everglades National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
